titles.title: A bill for the relief of Manuel, Felix, and William Marrero.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 9/21/1987--Introduced. Declares that three named sons of a Secret Service agent who was killed while on duty shall be considered to be children residing with a parent employed by the United States and thus be eligible to receive free public education under specified Federal law.
